dt: {bc}in a way pertaining to {d_link|grammar|grammar} {bc}with regard to grammar or in accordance with grammatical rules

dt.t: Two Welsh men who were busted for possession of marijuana were spared jail time by a judge who commended their {wi}grammatically{/wi} correct text messages.
Just as we teach children how to ride bikes by putting them on a bicycle, we need to teach students how to write {wi}grammatically{/wi} by letting them write.

shortdef: in a way pertaining to grammar : with regard to grammar or in accordance with grammatical rules
